content.html: Eventually I will post a full story of what happened in 2021 for me. But yes, it was the worst year in my life. 2022 will be better, and I'm looking forward to it. Note that there is no evil side in this story. Things are much more complicated than that in real life
content.value:
Eventually I will post a full story of what happened in 2021 for me. But yes, it was the worst year in my life. 2022 will be better, and I'm looking forward to it.

Note that there is no evil side in this story. Things are much more complicated than that in real life
